Class CivModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
CivModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CivModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
This class serves as the Model in MVC architecture and stores necessary information to run the game.
Author:
Anh Nguyen Phung, Hung Le Ba, Thu Tra, Peter Vo
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public CivModel​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      fileName - name of the file where data is saved

      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • getCell

      public CivCell getCell​(int row, int col)
      Get a cell data from the board
      Parameters:
      row - row position of the cell to be returned
      col - column position of the cell to be returned
      Returns:
      the cell at (row, col)

    • updateCell

      public void updateCell​(int row, int col, CivCharacter character, java.lang.String player)
      Update a cell on the board
      Parameters:
      row - row position of the cell to be updated
      col - column position of the cell to be updated
      character - character of the newly updated cell
      player - player of the newly updated cell
